text: The Apollo Theater is a music hall located at 253 West 125th Street between Adam Clayton Powell Jr. Boulevard (Seventh Avenue) and Frederick Douglass Boulevard in Harlem, Manhattan, New York City. It is a known location for African-American performers, and is the home of Showtime at the Apollo. In 1983, the building was added to the National Register of Historic Places. ==References== Category:Buildings and structures in Manhattan Category:New York City Designated Landmarks
title: Apollo Theater
